articles.title: OpenAI Anchors First Brand Campaign In Humanity, With A Little Help From ChatGPT
articles.summary: Shot on 35mm film in the US and UK, OpenAI's new campaign follows different characters using ChatGPT to cook, learn, travel and reach personal goals. It's the first large-scale brand campaign for OpenAI and shows how AI is changing everyday life.

articles.title: Beyond Meat, Inc. (BYND) Cuts Jobs as Revenue Slumps 20% in Q2
articles.author: Laiba Immad
articles.summary: Beyond Meat, Inc. (NASDAQ:BYND) was founded in 2009 and is known for its plant-based protein products. The company's mission focuses on improving human health and environmental impact through alternatives to animal meat. In September 2025, the firm reported a 19.6% year-over-year decline in Q2 revenue to $75 million and a net loss of $29.2 million. To address ongoing losses, the company plans to cut 6% of its workforce.

articles.title: Philippines urges UN to ensure AI will be used for peace
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: The Philippines has called on the UNSC to assert its leadership in harnessing artificial intelligence (AI) as a powerful driver of peace and security amid efforts to misuse it. Foreign Affairs Secretary Ma. Renata C. del Rosario calls for transparency and confidence-building among states with regard to AI defense applications.

articles.title: AI could widen gender pay gap in some sectors
articles.author: Alan Jones
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) could widen the gender pay gap in some industries, including construction, manufacturing, energy, logistics, utilities, private equity and the creative arts. However, the gap could be closed in other areas such as legal services, the public sector, journalism and marketing.

articles.title: Serco Asia Pacific Improves Integration Significantly Using Boomi AI Agents
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Serco is leveraging the Boomi Enterprise Platform to streamline data flows, enhance master data management, and simplify API connectivity. Serco's operations in Asia Pacific span defence, healthcare, justice and community services. Boomi Scribe and DesignGen are used as documentation base for integration, while Boomi DataHub and Boomi API Management are used for data quality.

GPTZero provides thorough reporting, identifying each sentence, along with an indication as to how likely each individual part of that sentence is machine-generated.

articles.title: Amgen Inc. (AMGN) Invests $650M to Expand Puerto Rico Biologics Facility, Adds 750 Jobs
articles.author: Laiba Immad
articles.summary: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is strengthening its U.S. manufacturing footprint with a major $650 million expansion announced in September 2025. The project will upgrade the biologics facility in Juncos, Puerto Rico. The expansion is expected to create nearly 750 new jobs, spanning construction and skilled manufacturing roles. It follows earlier investments of $900 million in Ohio and $1 billion in North Carolina.

Waymo could become a big growth driver in the next five years.

articles.title: To Get People Off the Street, He Pays for a One-Way Ticket Home

articles.summary: John Alle set up a hotline to help homeless people get off the streets in Santa Monica. He and his employee packed down people's tents, washed their laundry and ferried them to the airport. In the first few months, the program had sent about three people each week out of Santa Monica to reunite with family members in different states.

articles.title: AI Legend Sutton Wrote the Bitter Lesson- Gives His Suggestions for True Continual Learning
articles.author: Brian Wang
articles.summary: Sutton believes Reinforcement Learning is the Path to to Intelligence via Experience. Every agent must have a clear, external goal defined by rewards. AI progress historically favors methods leveraging massive computation and general learning from experience over human-curated knowledge. Sutton proposes a paradigm shift away from offline, imitation-based training to online, lifelong RL systems.

articles.summary: In Rie Qudan's "Sympathy Tower Tokyo," the protagonist turns to a chatbot dubbed 'AI-built' to ask questions about the origin of new Japanese words borrowed from foreign languages. She gripes about its tendency to 'mansplain things I hadn't actually asked about' to fuel engagement.

articles.title: Reclaiming agency before becoming semi-conscious humans
articles.author: The American Bazaar
articles.summary: Sreedhar Potarazu and Carin-Isabel Knoop discuss whether AI can be conscious. They argue that we need to be awake to our own agency before we hand over control of AI to machines. They discuss their previous pieces Filling in the Blanks and Knowing Pain and Knowing Gain.

articles.title: Reclaiming agency before becoming semi-conscious humans
articles.author: ABcontributor
articles.summary: Sreedhar Potarazu and Carin-Isabel Knoop ask if we are awake to our own agency before we hand it over to machines. Microsoft CEO Mustafa Suleyman warned that we are on the brink of creating 'Seemingly Conscious AI' systems that mimic human-like behaviors and responses.

articles.title: How AI Detection Saved My Life by Diagnosing Skin Cancer Early
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: AI Skin Cancer Detection Saves Woman's Life After Early Diagnosis. Lynsey Robertson, 46, an office manager at Buckshaw Village Surgery in Preston, Lancashire, was among the first to test a new AI-driven skin cancer screening tool at her clinic. The technology flagged a mole on her skin as high risk, prompting further inquiry and tests confirmed the presence of melanoma.

articles.title: SAP Exec: Get Ready to Be Fired Because of AI

articles.title: AI Safety Group Finds Agentic Tools Slow Down Open Source Devs
articles.author: John Werner

articles.title: Half of the Fortune 500 are gone since 2000. History moves faster than we remember and AI is on the march

articles.summary: CEOs are betting their careers on AI. AI can be a force multiplier that rewrites what problems are worth solving. AI will do an amazing job of accelerating bad processes and amplifying the incompetencies of employees if not deployed thoughtfully. The winners of the next decade won't be the companies that use AI to polish existing processes but those that uncover the signals human intuition misses and reimagine their operating model around them.

articles.summary: As part of his work in writing and developing a science of engineering prompts, I engaged AI in a variety of exchanges on various subjects. One exchange pointed quite accurately at the probable solution to the elusive Riemann hypothesis - with deep ramifications into quantum computing and quantum physics. The quality of the information received from AI depends heavily on the quality of question formulated and asked. Even a higher quality question can lead to a less than sharp and witty analysis of the issues and reflect political biases. AI gets caught in the same echo chambers as humans do via the internet.

articles.title: OpenAI shows off data center in Texas, with plans for one in Ohio
articles.author: Matt O'Brien
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman visited the Stargate artificial intelligence data center complex in Abilene, Texas, on Tuesday. The afternoon sun was so hot that Altman wore a T-shirt instead of a sweater. Stargate data center will power the future of ChatGPT.

articles.title: AI Safety Group Finds Agentic Tools Slow Down Open Source Devs
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: METR's randomized trial found AI tools slowed experienced open-source developers by 19%, highlighting benchmarking limits, learning curves, and contextual challenges in the AI toolset.      Â   .   in this case, the trial was conducted on a randomized trial.

articles.title: AngelAi Accelerates Middle East Expansion With Saudi Arabia Poised to Lead the AI-Driven Financial Transformation
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: AngelAi, the world's first empathetic AI platform for financial services, is deepening its footprint across Saudi Arabia and the Middle East. Saudi Arabia is emerging as the preferred launchpad for long-term partnerships and platform integration with U.S.-based AI innovation.

articles.title: This S-Tier Diablo 4 Season 10 Build Only Requires Players to Exist
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Streamlining a Diablo 4 build is a tough task, given the complexity of some classes' skill trees and the number of button presses needed to perform a task.    "Streamlining Diablo 4 builds is a difficult task on its own, but it's worth it.

articles.title: The AI boom is confronting an inconvenient truth about energy needs
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: The AI boom is confronting an inconvenient truth about energy needs Dallas News reports. The AI boom will confront the problem of energy needs in a very real and pressing way in the future. The article is an adaptation of Dallas News' article from its online edition, which is available here.
